mapper.select: SELECT provider_seq, image, enterprenuer, rapid_below100, rapid_above100, slow_fee FROM charging_fee WHERE provider_seq = #{provider_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE charging_fee SET image = #{image}, enterprenuer = #{enterprenuer}, rapid_below100 = #{rapid_below100}, rapid_above100 = #{rapid_above100}, slow_fee = #{slow_fee} WHERE provider_seq = #{provider_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO charging_fee ( provider_seq, image, enterprenuer, rapid_below100, rapid_above100, slow_fee ) VALUES ( provider_seq.nextval, #{image}, #{enterprenuer}, #{rapid_below100}, #{rapid_above100}, #{slow_fee} )
